alert.note: Alert for Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 06 at 10:50PM EST until February 08 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze expected. * WHERE...Southern Franklin, Southern Somerset, Kennebec and Interior Waldo Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A period of drizzle or freezing drizzle may occur before snow. Precipitation falling on cold, bare surfaces may lead to icy conditions despite air temperatures that may be above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to www.weather.gov/gray..

area.areaDesc: Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Southern Franklin; Southern Somerset
